# get src positions
ucmd lspSourceCursor main_template main.py 0
setenv offset stdout
ucmd lspSourceCursor main_template _discard 1
setenv offset2 stdout

ucmd lspDefinition main.py offset
contains stdout "&{{0 4} {0 9}}"

ucmd lspDefinition main.py offset2
contains stdout "&{{2 4} {2 9}}"

-- main_template --
def main1(a):
	return main2(a+1)
def main2(a):
	return a+1
print("%f" % m●ain1(1))
print("%f" % m●ain2(1))
